document.full_text: lawyers for dominique strauss-kahn have proof the imf chief was at a restaurant having lunch with his daughter at the time he was alleged to be sexually assaulting a hotel maid, france's rmc radio reported on monday.
document.title: strauss-kahn lawyers see alibi in sex case: report
lines_and_colors: lawyers for dominique strauss-kahn have proof the imf chief was at a restaurant having lunch with his daughter at the time he was alleged to be sexually assaulting a hotel maid, france's rmc radio reported on monday.
